show-habitable-zone.label: Show Habitable Zone
show-habitable-zone.tooltip: Show/Hide the habitable zone visualizations. Setting the value automatically updates the visibility for all added exoplanet systems.

show-orbit-uncertainty.label: Show Orbit Uncertainty
show-orbit-uncertainty.tooltip: Show/Hide disc visualization of the uncertainty of the planetary orbits. Setting the value automatically updates the visibility for all added exoplanet systems.

show-1-au-ring.label: Show 1 AU Size Ring
show-1-au-ring.tooltip: If true, show a ring with the radius 1 AU around the host star of each system, to use for size comparison. Setting the value automatically updates the visibility for all added exoplanet systems.
